title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1841/92 of 6 July 1992 fixing, for the 1992/93 marketing year, the threshold prices for rice
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1841/92
of 6  July 1992
fixing, for the 1992/93 marketing year, the threshold prices for rice
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The threshold prices for husked rice,  round grain milled rice and long grain milled rice are hereby fixed at:
(ECU/tonne) >TABLE>
The threshold price for broken rice is hereby fixed at ECU  281,91 per tonne.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 September 1992.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member  States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 July 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
